bibl.title: Fouilles d'Amyzon 6 Reconsidered: The Ptolemies at Amyzon.
bibl.note: New edition of the fragmentary decree published by: Jeanne et Louis ROBERT, Fouilles d'Amyzon en Carie (Paris, 1983) No. 6. The text does not belong to the reign of Soter. With its removal to a later period (later in the third century), all evidence for Caria having become a Ptolemaic province before the reign of Philadelphus disappears.
MEADOWS Andrew, Fouilles d'Amyzon 6 Reconsidered: The Ptolemies at Amyzon.
